citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-1:35 PM
on 03-OCT-18.
Inspector arrived to a locked gate at 12:30 pm. Inspector honked horn, called out for the licensee and call listed
number and left message. Sent text to mobile number.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-1:35 PM
on 03-OCT-18.
Inspector arrived to a locked gate at 12:30 pm. Inspector honked horn, called out for the licensee and call listed
number and left message.  Sent text to mobile number.
